{"id":380151216,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 8 months","timestamp":1597288540,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"44 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/380151216/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"89.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& A, vector<int>& B) {\n        \n        \n        \n        function<int(int,int,int,int,int)> kth = [&](int l1, int r1, int l2, int r2, int k) -> int {\n            if (l1 > r1) {\n                return B[l2 + k]; \n            }\n            \n            if (l2 > r2) {\n                return A[l1 + k]; \n            }\n            \n            int m1 = l1 + (r1 - l1)/2; int m2 = l2 + (r2 - l2)/2; \n            \n            if ((m1 - l1) + (m2 - l2) < k) {\n                if (A[m1] > B[m2]) {\n                    return kth(l1, r1, m2 + 1, r2, k - (m2 - l2) - 1);\n                } else {\n                    return kth(m1 + 1, r1, l2, r2, k - (m1 - l1) - 1);\n                }\n            } else {\n                if (A[m1] > B[m2]) {\n                    return kth(l1, m1 - 1, l2, r2, k); \n                } else {\n                    return kth(l1, r1, l2, m2 - 1, k); \n                }\n            }\n        };\n        \n        int li1 = 0; int ri1 = A.size() - 1; \n        int li2 = 0; int ri2 = B.size() - 1; \n        int len = A.size() + B.size(); \n        if (len % 2 == 1) {\n            return kth(li1, ri1, li2, ri2, len/2); \n            \n        } else {\n            return ((double)(kth(li1, ri1, li2, ri2, len/2) + kth(li1, ri1, li2, ri2, (len/2) - 1)))/2; \n        }\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays"}
